Shoolini University Online

Himachal Pradesh

NIRF- 46 | AICTE | UGC | WES

4.5 (128 user ratings)
★★★★★ 4.7/5

Study Mode: Distance

Institution Type : Private

About shoolini university

Shoolini University, located in the Solan district of Himachal Pradesh, was established in the year 2009, that comes under the top private university in India. The university has ranked amongst the top 100 universities by the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF).

After establishing a great name in the field of the regular mode of education, the university has now started its educational services through the online mode. Shoolini Online is an online venture, that has started offering various undergraduate and postgraduate courses through online mode.

For offering educational services via online mode, the university has gotten all the necessary accreditations like University Grants Commission (UGC), NIRF, and NAAC accreditations, etc. As per the QS World University Rankings, Shoolini Online has gotten 1st position in India and 6th position in Asia.

The university offers quite exciting benefits to the students in the online mode of learning like cost-effective learning, career support through interview prep and career sessions, and a sense of comfort to pay the full fee when you are satisfied with your after-course outcome

The most important advantage that an online course offer is quality learning with cost-effective budget options. And also enables the student to manage their studies along with gaining work experience, thereby progressively building their resume.

Approvals
  • UGC
  • NIRF
  • NAAC
  • ISO
Shoolini University Online Admission Process

  • For applying to any course in the Shoolini Online, the candidate has to apply online. Fresh batches generally start in the month of January-February month of every year. The last date for the January admission cycle is in March month. Admissions for the online courses are conducted on a direct basis, no entrance exams are shown for the same. The 2023 admission procedure for the online courses at Shoolini Online is as follows:

    Step 1: Visit the official website and click on “Enroll Now”.

    Step 2: Enquire about the concerned course and after that start the admission procedure through the online application form.

    Step 3: Fill up the application form and upload all the necessary documents in the prescribed format and size.

    Step 4: After this, pay the required amount of fee to secure the admission seat. Step 4-

    Step 5: After paying the fee and completing the application process, submit the admission form

    Step 6: After a few days the university will send the admission confirmation mail containing your enrollment number and other credentials

List of Documents
    • Marksheets
    • Residential Proof
    • Proof of Date of Birth
    • Government Issued ID
    • Photocopy of Disability Certificate/ Employment certificate/ Service proof in case of Defense or Paramilitary forces (if applicable)
    • Undertaking by the applicant in case of any pendency (Result awaited/ Reappear/Backlog or any other pendency)
    • Undertaking for Gap Period (if applicable)
    • Two passport size colored photographs
    • Demand Draft (DD) for the prescribed fee

Enquire Now

Don’t hesitate to contact us for more information

Why Shoolini University Online

After becoming a successful education provider in the regular mode, the Shoolini university has started its online venture to offer quality education.

The university has been accredited and recognized by UGC, NIRF, etc to provide the courses in online mode.

The online degree awarded by Shoolini Online has equal importance and value as the on-campus degree.

The course deliverables, lectures, and study materials can be easily accessed through the university Learning Management System.

The university offers the great benefit of paying 50% of their tuition fee after they get a placement offer or get admission to a desired foreign university to study abroad.

The university conducts online exams that are monitored through the online proctored software to ensure fair examination practices.

The university has partnered with various companies like Zydus, Biocon, Hindustan Unilever Limited, LG, L&T, etc to offer great placement support to the students even in online learning mode.

Through AI interview prep and resume-building sessions, increase your chance of being shortlisted for an interview with Shoolini Online
